resources.name: Launchpad: Non-POS Merchant Boarding
resources.description:
The Launchpads Merchant Boarding API allows Worldpay partners to onboard merchants to Worldpay's Payments Platform. Please see the Getting Started page for more information.

To contact our certifications team, please email Certification2@fisglobal.com.
To contact the product team, please email APICustomerIntegration@fisglobal.com.

resources.name: Initiate Boarding Application
resources.description: Resources to create/edit and read pending boarding applications.

resources.name: Choose Equipment
resources.description: Resources to choose the terminals.

resources.name: Submit Application
resources.description: Resources to validate and submit the final application for boarding.

resources.name: Check Application Status
resources.description: Resource to check status of the application.

resources.name: Review and Sign Contract
resources.description: Resources to retrieve the contract and digitally sign.

resources.name: Check Launchpad health
resources.description: Resources to check the the health of Launchpad and its dependent down streams systems at regular intervals to check the system is up or down.

resources.name: FetchApplication
resources.description: Retrieves existing application data.

resources.name: ExisitingApplication

resources.description: Use this endpoint to collect the merchant information needed to initiate a new contract.

resources.name: GetEquipmentSupported
resources.description: Retrieve applicable equipment for an existing application.

resources.name: GetAdditionalConfigurations
resources.description: Fetches a list of valid terminal customizations and peripherals, such as electing to password protect a void.

resources.name: GetTerminalInfo
resources.description: Gets the terminal configuration information for a specific partner.

resources.name: UpdateTerminal
resources.description: Updates terminal configurations.

resources.name: ConfigStandaloneTerminal
resources.description: Sets up terminal configurations.

resources.name: validateBoard
resources.description: Begins the merchant validation process before boarding after all necessary information has been submitted to the API. Please see the reference guide for specific boarding requirements.

resources.name: InititateBoard
resources.description: Begins the merchant boarding process after all necessary information has been submitted to the API. Please see the reference guide for specific boarding requirements.

resources.name: GetApplicationStatus
resources.description: Retrieves the status of a contract when passed with an externalRefID. Both the externalRefID and authorization header are required.

resources.name: fetchApplicationStatusHistory
resources.description: Use this endpoint to get a application's status history.

resources.name: fetchSignerStatus
resources.description: Use this endpoint to get signer status

resources.name: GetContract
resources.description: Returns a PDF contract to be signed.

resources.name: DocusignLink
resources.description: Retrieves a Docusign link to view the contract.

resources.name: Gethealth
resources.description: Checks the the health of Launchpad and its dependent down streams systems like CPQ, Sales Force, XAA and Jigsaw at regular intervals to check the system is up or down.
